TextView.android:text: Career Information Name, Virat Kohli ; Born, November 05, 1988 ; Age, 34 years 158 days ; Teams, India, Delhi, India Red, India U19, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Board Presidents XI Virat Kohli is an Indian international cricketer and the former captain of the Indian national cricket team who plays as a right-handed batsman for Royal Challengers Bangalore in the IPL and for the Delhi in Indian domestic cricket.
